name: DRSAttachment
title: DRS Attachment
description: A FHIR Attachment with a DRS url.

constraint.human: attachment.url must start with ^drs://. A drs:// hostname-based URI, as defined in the DRS documentation, that tells clients how to access this object. The intent of this field is to make DRS objects self-contained, and therefore easier for clients to store and pass around.  For example, if you arrive at this DRS JSON by resolving a compact identifier-based DRS URI, the `self_uri` presents you with a hostname and properly encoded DRS ID for use in subsequent `access` endpoint calls.
